greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of expansion for Debye function for n=1: D(1,x).
formula: a(n) = denominator(B(n)/(n+1)!), n >= 0. See the comment on the e.g.f. D(1,x) in A120082.- _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jul 15 2013
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jul 20 2006
